patterns: What is the mission of your company?
Can you tell me about the history and background?
I want to know about the company
Want to know about the company
Can you share your company information
Could you please mention what your company is about
responses:
Curio technologies is a global IT service provider and founded to assist corporation better manage their operation, through a cost-effective combination of professional services and technology. 
We are headquartered in Ontario, Canada. Our company has over 10 years of experience in Design, Technology and Consulting. 
We take pride in delivering Intelligent Technology Consulting and Engaging Experiences for clients all over the World also offers process outsourcing services. 
Curio is a company specialized in professional services, IT Consulting Services Software & Enterprise Application Development, Data Warehousing, Database development and Software Testing services.

Our QA lab has full range of outsourcing software testing services.

patterns: Can you share information about Cloud Management service
Want to know about the Cloud Management service
responses:
Cloud management is the process of maintaining oversight and administrative control of 
cloud computing products and services, whether deployed in public, private, or hybrid cloud environments. 
The practice of cloud management combines different software products and technologies together to provide a cohesive management strategy and process.

patterns: Can you share information about Cloud Migration service
Want to know about the Cloud Migration service
responses:
Cloud migrations are not just a quick lift-shift your current infrastructure to the Cloud, 
it needs to follow a certain set of processes to achieve the successful migration to any cloud. 
We at 1clouditsolutions Our experts have helped companies to successfully migrate their infrastructure to Cloud without any disruption and they make sure it is fast, 
cost-optimized, and also they are efficient in setting up automation processes to take full advantage of the Cloud.

patterns: How does Curiosoft approach cloud solution projects?
Can you share information about Cloud Security service
Want to know about the Cloud Security service
responses:
Cloud computing is the delivery of hosted services, including software, hardware, and storage, over the Internet. 
The benefits of rapid deployment, flexibility, low up-front costs, and scalability, have made cloud computing virtually universal among organizations of all sizes, often as part of a hybrid/multi-cloud infrastructure architecture.

patterns: Can you share information about Cloud Consulting service

responses:
Curiosoft Technologies provides consulting, migration and management services for the largest public cloud platforms in the world, 
offering managed services for AWS. 
We empower companies to realize the full potential of the cloud, letting them to leverage our expertise, tools, 
and experience to address their business requirements.
